results.name: Breaking Bad
results.overview: When Walter White, a New Mexico chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with Stage III cancer and given a prognosis of only two years left to live, he becomes filled with a sense of fearlessness.

results.name: Game of Thrones
results.overview: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros.

results.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
results.overview: Jake Peralta, an immature yet talented NYPD detective in Brooklyn's 99th Precinct, comes into immediate conflict with his new commanding officer.

results.name: Stranger Things
results.overview: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

results.name: WandaVision
results.overview: Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

results.name: House of the Dragon
results.overview: The story of the House Targaryen, set 200 years before the events of Game of Thrones.

results.name: The Mandalorian
results.overview: After the fall of the Galactic Empire, lawlessness has spread throughout the galaxy. A lone gunfighter makes his way through the outer reaches.

results.name: Rick and Morty
results.overview: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

results.name: The Boys
results.overview: A group of vigilantes known informally as "The Boys" set out to take down corrupt superheroes with no more than blue-collar grit and a willingness to fight dirty.

results.name: The Walking Dead
results.overview: Sheriff's deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

results.name: Money Heist
results.overview: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history.
